data.name: Pyrotech Mech - Shiryu
data.desc: You can Tribute Summon this card with 1 Tribute. If Summoned this way, during each End Phase: You take 1000 damage. If this card attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage to your opponent.
